scripts.publish@core: cd packages && cd inori-core && yarn publish && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.publish@native: cd packages && cd inori && yarn add inori-core && yarn publish && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.publish@web: cd packages && cd inori-native && yarn add inori-core && yarn publish && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.publish: yarn publish@core && yarn publish@web && yarn publish@native
